statements: DELETE FROM storage_performance_dashboard WHERE storage_used >= 1000 AND read_latency > 2.50;
DELETE FROM dashboard_data WHERE storage_id = 5 AND dashboard_name = 'Example Dashboard'
DELETE FROM storage_metrics WHERE storage_id = 1 AND total_capacity > 1000
DELETE FROM dashboard_activity WHERE user_id = 3 AND action = 'login'
DELETE FROM storage_alerts WHERE alert_name = 'Disk Full';
DELETE FROM storage_alerts WHERE alert_id = 3 AND alert_timestamp < '2022-01-01';

DELETE FROM storage_performance_data WHERE id = 1;

DELETE FROM dashboard_users WHERE role = 'Admin';
